data.name: warehouseReport.ReportResourceString
data.value:
﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Report ScriptLanguage="Vb" ReportInfo.Created="05/22/2018 17:17:22" ReportInfo.Modified="05/22/2018 19:19:33" ReportInfo.CreatorVersion="2018.3.1.0"> <Dictionary> <OdbcDataConnection Name="Connection" ConnectionString="rijcmlqDsfwzqmpop0DqfGfr49Br1BEBRTg6bCmgJFsVfVGp0qFPEObhd3hT7IFAJw4XsqVYmk56fnGKrcLO+UpGfNk7yovZ1WDCE4n41hnLNhwI3xuKlum6GekWMmGhQ3H+LNq"> <TableDataSource Name="Table" Alias="Warehouse" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 categorygoods.CategoryGoodsName,
 goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerName,
 goodscatalog.GoodsName,
 warehouse.WarehouseGoodsAmount,
 goodscatalog.GoodsID
FROM warehouse
 INNER JOIN goodscatalog
 ON warehouse.GoodsID = goodscatalog.GoodsID
 INNER JOIN goodsmanufacturer
 ON goodscatalog.GoodsManufacturerID = goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerID
 INNER JOIN categorygoods
 ON goodscatalog.CategoryGoodsID = categorygoods.CategoryGoodsID"> <Column Name="CategoryGoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsManufacturerName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="WarehouseGoodsAmount" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsID" DataType="System.Int32"/> </TableDataSource> </OdbcDataConnection> <Total Name="TotalAmount" Expression="[Warehouse.WarehouseGoodsAmount]" Evaluator="Data1"/> </Dictionary> <ReportPage Name="Page1"> <ReportTitleBand Name="ReportTitle1" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text1" Left="132.3" Top="9.45" Width="434.7" Height="28.35" Text="Количество товаров на складе" HorzAlign="Center" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 20pt, style=Bold"/> </ReportTitleBand> <PageHeaderBand Name="PageHeader1" Top="49.54" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text4" Top="9.45" Width="718.2" Height="28.35" Fill.Color="DarkGray" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 16pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text2" Top="9.45" Width="614.25" Height="28.35" Text="НАИМЕНОВАНИЕ" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text3" Left="614.25" Top="9.45" Width="103.95" Height="28.35" Text="КОЛ-ВО" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> </PageHeaderBand> <GroupHeaderBand Name="GroupHeader1" Top="99.07" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" Condition="[Warehouse.CategoryGoodsName]"> <TextObject Name="Text5" Top="9.45" Width="718.2" Height="18.9" Fill.Color="LightGray" Text="[[Warehouse.CategoryGoodsName]]" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <DataBand Name="Data1" Top="139.16" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" DataSource="Table"> <TextObject Name="Text6" Top="9.45" Width="189" Height="18.9" Text="[Warehouse.GoodsManufacturerName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text7" Left="189" Top="9.45" Width="425.25" Height="18.9" Text="[Warehouse.GoodsName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text8" Left="614.25" Top="9.45" Width="103.95" Height="18.9" Text="[Warehouse.WarehouseGoodsAmount]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text9" Top="9.45" Width="614.25" Height="18.9" Text="Всего товаров на складе:" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text10" Left="614.25" Top="9.45" Width="103.95" Height="18.9" Text="[TotalAmount]" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 12pt, style=Bold"/> </ColumnFooterBand> <PageFooterBand Name="PageFooter1" Top="231.06"
